headline: Ralph Lauren Corporation (RL)’s Isn’t “As Analogous” To Tapestry As You Think, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Latest Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Radar. Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL)’s shares dipped by 3.9% in August after peer firm Tapestry warned that it would have to take a $160 million hit to its income statement due to tariffs. […]
